participant_1.name: Ava
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, Ava is always looking for new experiences and loves to express herself through her work and hobbies.
participant_1.background: I like to listen to music as a way to relax after a day of welding and working towards my goal of skydiving. I prefer a nice glass of wine with my cheese platter. My father is from India. I love her though. I'm deathly afraid of snakes, but not bugs.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: An outgoing and enthusiastic tech enthusiast, Liam enjoys sharing his passions and values time spent with friends and family.
participant_2.background: I worked on building the latest drone model for my company. I love spending time with my dog on Christmas. I live far from my family, but I love them. My mornings consist of listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers while I get ready for the day. I am a very tall woman.

content.text: I really enjoy working on drones, I'm a bit of a nerd.
Welding! That's so cool. I've always wanted to try it.
It's really fun, and you can make so many things with it.
Yeah, I can see how that would be fun.
What do you like to do on the weekends?
I like to spend time with my dog, and I'm always down for a good party.
I love spending time with my dog too! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a German Shepherd. He's the best.
German Shepherds are awesome! I love their big personalities.
What's your favorite music to listen to?
I really like Red Hot Chili Peppers.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands.
Yeah, I've seen them a few times. They put on a great show.
